verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I LIFT MY HEAD
(echo)
To the coming King (echo),
To the great I AM (echo),
To You I sing. (echo),
For You're the one (echo)
Who reigns within my heart.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For I will serve no foreign god,
Nor any other treasure;
For You are my heart's desire,
The Spirit without measure.
Unto Your name I will bring my sac
